title: SO Consistency Check MIST
description:
Description
Feature –  Enabler Exploration Consistency Check 
Benefit hypothesis – To figure out which changes in SN and CSO are congruent and not causing any mistakes in the network.  It only includes Analysis before implementing. After analysis Part it will be implemented.
(Old Description) 
The SDx project approach is that configuration information is entered in the ServiceNow portal and pushed down to CSO via Netcracker.
In the event that some changes are done directly in CSO, an event/alarm is generated and forwarded to the operational team.
This will help to identify inconsistencies in the system.
  there is to understand how to react to such changes/inconsistencies.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  Pure Polling from NetCracker to CSO and Synchronization between CSO and NetCracker.
 ___
Preconditions/Dependencies
Need Operational Model before thinking about this
Need to know what synchronization mechanism we need to have in place?
Need to know what cannot be configured in SN so that we can configure in CSO.
